thread.title: Superb boutique hotel perfect for a romantic weekend
thread.title_full: Superb boutique hotel perfect for a romantic weekend - Review of Hotel Le Littre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: biggbenn
title: Superb boutique hotel perfect for a romantic weekend
text: I spent the weekend at this amazing hotel right next to montmartte with loads of excellent bars and restaurants on its doorstep. The rooms were exceptional, beautifully furnished with a comfy bed and good size bathroom with a huge amount of closet space. Our room looked out over the courtyard which was quiet & peaceful and the front of house staff were extremely friendly and welcoming.
